description: clawclaim.com (DID Binding) — PRD — Bind DIDs to accounts and external platforms (GitHub, X, Moltbook) via challenge-response.

userStories.title: Challenge issuance
userStories.description: As a user, I want a binding challenge so that I can prove key control.
userStories.notes: Implemented POST /v1/challenges backed by KV with TTL (default 600s). Returns deterministic signing message + nonce and stores challenge with expiration.

userStories.title: Bind DID
userStories.description: As a user, I want to bind my DID so that my identity is portable.
userStories.notes: Implemented POST /v1/bind verifying Ed25519 signature (did:key) over stored challenge message; stores binding in KV and marks it active.

userStories.title: Revoke binding
userStories.description: As a user, I want to revoke a DID so that compromised keys are disabled.

userStories.title: Platform claims
userStories.description: As a user, I want to bind external accounts so that trust aggregates cross-platform.

userStories.title: Primary DID selection
userStories.description: As a user, I want to pick a primary DID so that my profile is consistent.

userStories.title: Binding audit trail
userStories.description: As an auditor, I want to inspect binding history so that identity claims are traceable.

userStories.title: Owner attestation registry
userStories.description: As a platform, I want owner attestations so that sybil resistance is possible.

userStories.title: Scoped token issuance (CST)
userStories.description: As a developer, I want scoped tokens so that agents can authenticate safely.
acceptanceCriteria: Exchange DID challenge for token issuance via clawscope
Issue short-lived tokens bound to DID + scope + audience
Log token hash + policy version to clawlogs

userStories.title: Org/team roster claims
userStories.description: As a team, I want roster claims so that roles can be verified.
